titleStmt.title: Ecclesi. XX. Remember death, and thou shalt neuer sinne
titleStmt.author: Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdeley, dwelling in litle Britaine streete wythout Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Signed: quoth Ioh. Awd., i.e. John Awdelay.
Verse - "Ye Adams broode and earthly wightes, which breath now on the earth,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
